commandDescription: Deletes references from csv files based on input
dirFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input csv recordTypes. Default: '%s'
objectFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input csv recordTypes. Default: '%s'
recordtypeFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input csv recordTypes. Default: '%s'
apinameFlagDescription: Specify the type of resource you want to delete. Required.
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
